title: Confidence in Hurts? Biggest threat to Chiefs? Defining Success in NFC South
itunes:title: Confidence in Hurts? Biggest threat to Chiefs? Defining Success in NFC South
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at how Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts will adjust in year three. Hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Tom Pelissero, Darius Butler and Adam Rank explain why they have confidence in Hurts and then they share which team is the biggest threat to the Kansas City Chiefs in the AFC West. Later, the GMFB crew defines success for each team in the NFC South and then in honor of Heinz field, the panel shares things they aren’t used to yet like the Raiders being in Las Vegas. The show finishes up being joined by former NFL GM Scott Pioli and he weighs in on the Carolina Panthers trading for Baker Mayfield, the Las Vegas Raiders making history hiring Sandra Douglass Morgan, and how Jalen Hurts can take strides in year three.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
